title: It’s Summertime: Bare Calves, Bare Knees, Full Hair!
itunes:title: It’s Summertime: Bare Calves, Bare Knees, Full Hair!
description:
Summer is upon us! For SuChin, that means she’s bringing out her annual shorts set and ankle socks. For Kulap, that means trying out all her favorite hair products and tools. Everything is deranged and derailed as usual – so buckle in. It’s a hot one.

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • SuChin bought this year’s shorts set from Target – a lovely two-piece set
  • Kulap loves Hello Jupiter for the small amounts of time there’s a little irritation or dryness in her scalp. “Cadillac level” product, in her words. Currently backordered, but will start shipping again in late July.
  • Lanshin’s newest tool – Jade Scalp Stimulator
  • New skincare game changer! Nurch Hyaluronic Acid 
  • Ku loves the Anti-Gravity from Kevin Murphy to get more volume in her hair
  • But then, in order to get free shipping, she found Cool Angel which she loves for blending her greys
  • This Eu' Genia Shea Butter was a saving grace for SuChin and her family in Hawaii
  • Ku and Su have been using the St. Lucia styling oil that was mentioned on the show by Jessica St. Clair last summer

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 


Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
